TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HashAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
Public MustInherit Class HashAlgorithm Implements ICryptoTransform
type HashAlgorithm = class interface IDisposable interface ICryptoTransform

summary.span: 代表基底類別，密碼編譯雜湊演算法的所有實作必須從它衍生。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of cryptographic hash algorithms must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊函式會以現代的密碼編譯基本。Hash functions are fundamental to modern cryptography. 這些函式會將任意長度的二進位字串對應至固定長度，稱為雜湊值的小型二進位字串。These functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length, known as hash values. 密碼編譯雜湊函式具有屬性，就無法找到兩個不同的輸入設為相同值的雜湊。A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value. 雜湊函式通常用於使用數位簽章，資料的完整性。Hash functions are commonly used with digital signatures and for data integrity. 雜湊做為代表大量資料的固定大小的唯一值。The hash is used as a unique value of fixed size representing a large amount of data. 如果對應的資料也會比對，應該符合兩組資料的雜湊。Hashes of two sets of data should match if the corresponding data also matches. 對資料進行小變更會導致無法預期的大量變更，在雜湊。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會計算陣列的雜湊。The following code example computes the hash for an array. 此範例假設是預先定義的位元組陣列`dataArray[]`。This example assumes that there is a predefined byte array `dataArray[]`. 在衍生類別的。 is a derived class of . [!code-cpp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方式的簡單呼叫方法。This method is a simple call to the method. 呼叫`Dispose`可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途的類別。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the class to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊`Dispose`，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會計算雜湊值的字串，並傳回做為 64 個字元的十六進位格式字串的雜湊。The following example computes the hash value of a string and returns the hash as a 64-character, hexadecimal-formatted string. 此程式碼範例所建立的雜湊字串適用於任何 SHA256 雜湊函式 （在任何平台） 上建立 64 個字元的十六進位格式的雜湊的字串。The hash string created by this code example is compatible with any SHA256 hash function (on any platform) that creates a 64-character, hexadecimal-formatted hash string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個多載會使用雜湊演算法的實作。By default, this overload uses the implementation of a hash algorithm. 如果您想要指定不同的實作，使用多載，可讓您改為指定的演算法名稱。If you want to specify a different implementation, use the overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead. 密碼編譯組態系統定義的預設實作。The cryptography configuration system defines the default implementation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將寫入物件的資料轉遞到用來計算雜湊的雜湊演算法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會呼叫應用程式程式碼。This method is not called by application code. 這個抽象的方法會執行雜湊計算。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次寫入至密碼編譯資料流物件會通過這個方法中的資料。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 對於每個資料區塊，這個方法會更新雜湊物件的狀態，因此資料流結尾傳回正確的雜湊值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] HashFinal() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function HashFinal () As Byte()

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，當密碼編譯資料流物件處理最後的資料後，會對雜湊計算做最後處理。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.
The computed hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會完成任何部分的計算，並傳回資料流的正確雜湊值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value for the data stream.

summary.span: 表示雜湊計算的狀態。

span.span: Represents the state of the hash computation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位用來防止使用者變更雜湊作業期間的索引鍵的雜湊演算法的金鑰。This field is used to prevent users from changing the key of a keyed hash algorithm during a hash operation. 合法的索引鍵的變更時，這個欄位的值會是零之前和之後的雜湊作業。When a key change is legitimate, the value of this field is zero both before and after a hash operation. 不合法的索引鍵的變更時，這個欄位的值為非零值。When a key change is not legitimate, the value of this field is nonzero.

param.name: inputBuffer
param.span: 要用來計算雜湊碼的輸入。

span.span: The input to compute the hash code for.

param.name: inputOffset
param.span: 位元組陣列中的座標，從此處開始使用資料。

span.span: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: inputCount
param.span: 位元組陣列中要用作資料的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes in the byte array to use as data.

summary.span: 計算所指定位元組陣列中指定區域的雜湊值。

span.span: Computes the hash value for the specified region of the specified byte array.

returns.span: 進行雜湊之輸入陣列部分的複本。

span.span: An array that is a copy of the part of the input that is hashed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫方法之後呼叫方法之前擷取的最後一個雜湊值。You must call the method after calling the method but before you retrieve the final hash value. 請注意，這個方法的傳回值不是雜湊值，但輸入資料的雜湊的組件的複本。Note that the return value of this method is not the hash value, but only a copy of the hashed part of the input data. 若要擷取最後一個雜湊值之後呼叫方法中，位元組陣列中所包含的 get屬性。To retrieve the final hashed value after calling the method, get the byte array contained in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法使用雜湊字串的方法。The following code examples use the method with the method to hash a string.
